channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Optimist’s Case For Bungie’s ‘Marathon’
item.description: Making an optimist’s case for Marathon, and even if all of this doesn’t pan out, if anyone can break into a crowded market, it’s Bungie.

item.title: Snowflake CEO Says AI ROI Starts With Getting The Data Right
item.description: In a world chasing agentic AI and automation-first SaaS, Sridhar Ramaswamy argues the path to enterprise value starts not with models — but with clean...

item.title: Conversational AI: Merging IQ And EQ For Smarter Dialogue
item.description: How do we make AI conversationally intelligent, and why does that matter? Answer by Sean White.

item.title: Rouvy Wants Cyclists To Map The World With Their Rides

item.title: AI Agents: Hype Vs. Reality – Practical Impact Over Perfect Autonomy
item.description: How should businesses think about AI agents? Answer by Chris Taylor.

item.title: The essence of industrialism

item.title: Where is your N + 1?

item.title: The AI effort gap
